page.title: 12NEWICK NEWS
page.content: The only local paper purely for Newick is the 'Newick News', issued four times a year, by the Conservative Association. In one recent issue were the following items: 1.Consideration of contingency plans in the event of nuclear attack. 2.A 'crime alert' organisation, with lists of names and the areas for which they are responsible. 3.A tree planted on the Meridian Line. 4.Details of the prospective Conservative Candidate. 5.A farewell from the previous member. 6.Youth Club news. 7.Newick F.C.'s season's successes. 8.Details of the new owners of the local restaurant. 9.The of the new job of Village Handyman. 10.A roundup of Newick Conservative news for the year.
